translations.translation: And say: "I am a distinct warner,"
and clearly tell the unbelievers: "I am most certainly a plain warner,"
Say, "Indeed, I am simply one who warns."
And proclaim, “Indeed I, yes I, am the clear Herald of Warning.”
And say (O Muhammad): "I am indeed a plain warner."
And say: Surely I am the plain warner.
and say, 'Surely, I am the manifest warner.'
And say: Lo! I, even I, am a plain warner,
and say, "I am, indeed, a plain warner,"
And say thou: verily I! I am a plain warner.
and say, ‘I am indeed a manifest warner [of punishment from God],’
And say: "I am indeed he that warneth openly and without ambiguity,"-
And say: "I am indeed a plain warner."
And say: 'I am the plain warner'
And say, “I am the clear warner.”
And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
[15:89] And say: ‘Indeed, I am the warner, of God’s chastisement, lest it be sent down on you, the clear [warner], clear in [his] warning.
(And say: Lo! I, even I, am a plain warner) I am a messenger warning you against Allah's chastisement, in a language that you all understand,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَقُلْ } للمعاندين المنكرين: { إِنِّيۤ } بإذن ربي ووحيه إليّ { أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ } [الحجر: 89] والمنذر المبين، أنذركم ببيان واضح، وبرهان لائح، نازلٍ عليَّ من ربي أن العقاب والعذاب سينزل على من لم يؤمن بالله، وبوحدة ذاته، وصفات كماله
